==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|あお|そら|r=y|k2=ぞら|yomi=kun}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あおぞら|青|tr1=ao|t1=blue|空|tr2=sora|t2=sky}}. The ''sora'' changes to ''zora'' due to {{rendaku|あおぞら}}.

The reading was ''aosora'' until roughly the mid-[[w:Meiji period|Meiji Period]]. The shift to [[rendaku]] pronunciation has been relatively recent.

===Pronunciation===
* [[訓読み|Kun'yomi]]
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/aozoɽa/|[äo̞zo̞ɽä]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|あおぞら|hhira=あをぞら}}

# a [[blue]] [[sky]], a [[clear]] sky
# {{qualifier|when preceding another noun}} [[outdoors]], in the [[open]], [[open-air]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''青空'''市場|'''あおぞら''' いちば|an '''open-air''' market}}
